duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide primary support to the senior-level Executive Assistant and complete tasks related to the support of the executive team and high-level senior managers.
Receive incoming calls, take detailed messages, and respond appropriately on executive’s behalf.
Greet visitors and assist them appropriately on executive’s behalf.
Manage and coordinate meeting materials for Board of Managers and Board of Directors’ meetings.
Assist legal and accounting departments as needed.
Organize and manage business files and documents.
Manage travel arrangements and coordinate all trips.
Provide leadership, coaching, and mentoring to other executive and administrative assistants.
Assist with planning and execution of company events and corporate initiatives.
Provide exceptional customer service to internal management and external business partners.

education_certification.credential: Associate's/Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience preferred.
